    def setupUi(self, lisan):
        lisan.setObjectName("lisan")
        lisan.resize(800, 600)
        self.centralwidget = QtWidgets.QWidget(lisan)
        self.centralwidget.setObjectName("centralwidget")
        self.pushButton = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.centralwidget)
        self.pushButton.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(210, 180, 85, 26))
        self.pushButton.setObjectName("pushButton")
        self.pushButton_2 = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.centralwidget)
        self.pushButton_2.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(420, 180, 85, 26))
        self.pushButton_2.setObjectName("pushButton_2")

        self.menubar.setObjectName("menubar")

        self.statusbar.setObjectName("statusbar")

        self.retranslateUi(lisan)
        QtCore.QMetaObject.connectSlotsByName(lisan)

    def retranslateUi(self, lisan):
        _translate = QtCore.QCoreApplication.translate
        lisan.setWindowTitle(_translate("lisan", "lisan"))
        self.pushButton.setText(_translate("lisan", "sin"))
        self.pushButton_2.setText(_translate("lisan", "cos"))

import sys
from PyQt5.QtWidgets import QApplication, QMainWindow

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pylab as pl
import nn

def sin():
    pl.rcParams['font.sans-serif']=['SimHei']
    pl.rcParams['axes.unicode_minus']=False
    a=np.arange(-4*np.pi,4*np.pi,0.1)
    b=np.sin(a)
    pl.scatter(a,b)
    pl.title('sinx')
    pl.show()

def cos():
    pl.rcParams['font.sans-serif']=['SimHei']
    pl.rcParams['axes.unicode_minus']=False
    a=np.arange(-4*np.pi,4*np.pi,0.1)
    b=np.cos(a)
    pl.scatter(a,b)
    pl.title('cosx')
    pl.show()


if __name__ == '__main__':
    app = QApplication(sys.argv)
    MainWindow = QMainWindow()
    ui = nn.Ui_lisan()
    ui.setupUi(MainWindow)
    MainWindow.show()
    ui.pushButton.clicked.connect(sin)
    ui.pushButton_2.clicked.connect(cos)
    sys.exit(app.exec_())
